description: GO FOR CRUNCH For authentic Mexican dishes, you can’t go past the delicious crunch of Mission White Corn Tortilla Strips. Cook with them or eat them straight out of the bag.
name: Chipotle Chicken With Crunchy Tortilla Strip Crust Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt 230g Mission White Corn Tortilla Strips
500g chicken breast fillets, cut into 1.5cm pieces
1 pkt red capsicum, deseeded, finely chopped
400g can no-added salt black beans, rinsed, drained
0.25 cup chipotle in adobo sauce, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large ovenproof frying pan over medium heat. Add chicken and seasoning, then cook for 10 minutes, stirring, or until chicken is browned and almost cooked through.
Add capsicum, corn, beans, chipotle in adobo sauce and puree, then cook for 5 minutes, stirring, or until capsicum is tender. Remove pan from heat.

Preheat oven grill to high. Top chicken mixture with tortilla strips and sprinkle with cheese. Grill for 5 minutes or until tortilla strips and cheese are golden. Serve topped with avocado, jalapeño and coriander.
